vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.33;
daughter of: Zelophehad (H6765);
sister of: Mahlah (H4244), Noah (H5270), Milcah (H4435H) and Tirzah (H8656)
§ Hoglah = "partridge"
3rd of 5 daughters of Zelophehad, a descendant of Manasseh
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Selofhad; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
曷拉 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "鷓鴣"
西羅非哈五個女兒的第三位, 瑪拿西的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
曷拉 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "鹧鸪"
西罗非哈五个女儿的第三位, 玛拿西的后裔
